  • Enclosing class:
    Icon
    public static class Icon.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds a Icon that is too detailed for a simple constructor

                             int color)
        Set the color of a given state
        Parameters:

        color - the rgba packed color (use android.graphics.Color)
        Returns:

      • setSize

        public Icon.Builder setSize​(int width,
                            int height)
        Set the icon size. All images states will be scaled to this size. If SIZE_DEFAULT is set for width or height, all images will be scaled to the natural width and height of the default state image.
        Parameters:
        width - the width in pixels (use SIZE_DEFAULT to use natural image width)
        height - the hieght in pixels (use SIZE_DEFAULT to use natural image height)
        Returns:
        this Builder

      • setAnchor

        public Icon.Builder setAnchor​(int x,
                              int y)
        Set the point that is to be mapped to the on screen destination point. The values are an offset in pixels from the upper left corner (0, 0) of the final image size. Negative values are permitted.
        Parameters:
        x - the offset in pixels (use ANCHOR_CENTER to always map to the center)
        y - the offset in pixels (use ANCHOR_CENTER to always map to the center)
        Returns:
        this Builder

      • build

        public Icon build()
        Build the icon
        Returns:
        a new Icon
